list.name: FinanceBOT
list.desc: Telegram-bot for convenient personal-finance tracking and paid-subscription management.
list.details:
FinanceBOT is a Telegram bot that lets you manage personal finances right in the chat.

### Key features
• **Transaction log** — add income/expense, view balance and history.
• **Budget & goals** — set a monthly limit and track goal progress.
• **Reports** — period summaries, charts, CSV export.
• **Paid plans** — payment checks and renewal reminders.

### Tech
Python 3.12 • Aiogram 3 • SQLite + SQLModel • Docker • CI/CD (GitHub Actions → Docker Hub)

list.name: Classic Coffee
list.desc: Telegram bot for ordering coffee in advance, no waiting in line.
list.details:
Classic Coffee lets you place an order ahead so you can pick up your ready cup.

#### Features
• Menu with photos and prices.
• Payments via Telegram Pay.
• “Your drink is ready” notifications.
• Web panel for barista status updates.

#### Stack
Python • Aiogram • FastAPI (admin API) • PostgreSQL • Docker Compose.

list.name: School Diary Bot
list.desc: Electronic diary: grades, alerts, statistics ― all in Telegram.
list.details:
A Telegram bot that completely replaces the classic e-diary.

* Student login by token.
* Grade table and subject GPA.
* Push alerts for new marks.
* Performance stats and term chart.

Architecture — Aiogram 3 + modular routers, async MongoDB driver, PyTest.
